summary: A youth futsal team representing a suburban academy claimed the under-17 regional championship, winning all five of its matches and conceding only two goals in the tournament.

event_type.category: Major Tournament Results and Championship Outcomes

summary: An indoor futsal team has re-signed its leading scorer to a one-year extension after the expiration of his previous deal, with a clause allowing either party to negotiate a move abroad at the end of the season.

event_type.category: Player Transfers, Trades, and Contract Signings

summary: A second-tier baseball club has finalized a one-year minor league contract with a recently released relief pitcher, providing an invitation to preseason training camp and incentives tied to major league call-ups.

event_type.category: Player Transfers, Trades, and Contract Signings
